sentences.en: a ban on the export of toxic waste
As the domestic market becomes saturated, firms begin to export the product.
sentences.cn: 由于国内市场饱和，各公司开始外销。

sentences.en: Export orders improved in the last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月出口订单增加了。

sentences.en: He is familiar with export procedure.
He posted up the export sales.
sentences.cn: 他把外销账过到分类账上.

sentences.en: Italian food has been exported all over the world.
sentences.cn: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

sentences.en: Purchase tax was not payable on goods for export.
sentences.cn: 出口商品不需要交购买税。

sentences.en: Some coffee and cacao are grown for export.
sentences.cn: 种植的咖啡豆和可可豆有些是为了出口.

sentences.en: The company exports tuna to the US.
sentences.cn: 这家公司向美国出口金枪鱼。

sentences.en: The Institute of Export now fears that 100,000 jobs will go.
sentences.cn: 现在出口协会担心将失去10万个工作机会。

sentences.en: The islands export sugar and fruit.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿出口糖和水果。

sentences.en: These cars are made for export.
sentences.cn: 这些汽车是为出口而生产的.

sentences.en: They export their products to markets throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 他们把产品出口到世界各地的市场。

sentences.en: To earn foreign exchange we must export.
sentences.cn: 要想获得外汇，我们必须出口。

sentences.en: Tourism is Britain's single biggest invisible export.
sentences.cn: 旅游业是英国最大的一项无形输出。

sentences.en: We import raw materials and energy and export mainly in-dustrial products.
sentences.cn: 我们进口原材料和能源，主要出口工业产品。

sentences.en: We now export all kinds of industrial products.
sentences.cn: 我们现在出口各种工业产品.

sentences.en: Wheat is one of the country’s main exports.
sentences.cn: 小麦是该国的主要出口商品之一。

words.tran_cn: 输出，[贸易]出口；出口商品

phrases.tran_cn: 出口信用保险；输出信用保险；出口信贷保险
出口许可证，输出许可证
进出口；导入和导出；输入和输出

trans.tran_en: the business of selling and sending goods to other countries
to sell goods to another country
the business of selling and sending goods to other countries
to sell goods to another country
to sell goods to another country
